CHAPTER ONE

CHAPTER SIX

[BRYSTIN]97-brystin

By midnight , [Michael]98-michael still has n’t returned to [the room]2749-the room . [I]0-i ’ve been a mess trying to pass the time . [I]0-i showered . Changed into pajamas . Tried to read and failed . Texted about the evening with [Zully]97-brystin , who found a way to blame [Michael]98-michael for everything . Cried for a while about how degrading the whole experience has been , and then put light makeup on [my]0-i clean face to hide [my]0-i puffy eyes . [I]0-i ’m considering putting on a robe and going to look for [him]98-michael when the door finally opens . [I]0-i practically jump on [him]98-michael . “ Well ? ”[0-i] [He]98-michael runs [his]98-michael hand through [his]98-michael hair , assessing [me]0-i in silence . [I]0-i feel like punching [him]98-michael . “ Do n’t just stand there . What happened ? Tell [me]98-michael ! ”[98-michael] “ [I’m]0-i … [I’m]0-i trying to figure out where to start . ”[98-michael] Usually , [I]0-i like hearing things from the beginning , but [I]0-i ’m too miserable and anxious . “ Did [we]2921-we get it ? That ’s all [I]98-michael want to know . ”[98-michael] [He]98-michael ’s serious , and [I]0-i ’m nervous . [He]98-michael ’s always serious , but not this serious . CHAPTER SEVEN

BRYSTIN

CHAPTER THIRTEEN

BRYSTIN

[I]0-i ’m washing [my]0-i hands when [my]0-i phone buzzes with a text . After the way [Holt]72-holt looked at [me]0-i with [Michael]98-michael , [I]0-i suspect it ’s from [him]72-holt .

Send [me]0-i a picture of [your]0-i pussy .

That was not the message [I]0-i was expecting . [I]0-i ignore [my]0-i stupid stomach flip and type in [my]0-i response .

Not a chance .

[You]0-i ’re not wearing panties . It should be easy .

[I]0-i almost ask if this has to do with [Michael]98-michael , then change [my]0-i mind , sure that jealousy is not in [Holt]72-holt ’s nature .

CHAPTER TWENTY - TWO

CHAPTER THIRTY

BRYSTIN

ABOUT [LAURELIN PAIGE]67-laurelin paige

With millions of books sold , [Laurelin Paige]67-laurelin paige is the NY Times , [Wall Street Journal]64-wall street journal , and [USA]65-usa [Today Bestselling Author of the Fixed Trilogy]2653-today bestselling author of the fixed trilogy . [She]67-laurelin paige 's a sucker for a good romance and gets giddy anytime there 's kissing , much to the embarrassment of [[her]67-laurelin paige three daughters]2654-her three daughters . [[Her]67-laurelin paige husband]371-her husband does n't seem to complain , however . When [she]67-laurelin paige is n't reading or writing sexy stories , [she]67-laurelin paige 's probably singing , watching shows like [Billions]244-billions and Succession or dreaming of [Michael Fassbender]245-michael fassbender . [She]67-laurelin paige 's also [a proud member of [Mensa International]66-mensa international]2656-a proud member of mensa international though [she]67-laurelin paige does n't do anything with [the organization]2657-the organization except use it as material for [her]67-laurelin paige bio .
